mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS productId,c.productName AS productName,c.MedicineType AS MedicineType, c.commonName AS commonName,c.productState AS productState,c.unit AS unit, a.id AS agreementproductdetailId,a.agreementSummaryId AS agreementSummaryId, a.commerceGauge AS productGauge,a.commerceCode AS productCode,a.supplyPrice AS unitPrice, b.Achange,b.theNumber,b.packageNum,b.sumPrice,b.isSMS, '正常供应' AS suppyType FROM (SELECT * FROM scm_xs_agreementproductdetail WHERE agreementSummaryId = #{arg1} ) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT a.id AS bigContractId,a.DealerClauseId,b.Achange,b.productCode,b.theNumber,b.packageNum,b.unitPrice,b.sumPrice,c.AgreementSummaryId,b.isSMS FROM scm_xs_bigcontract a INNER JOIN scm_xs_bigcontractproduct b ON a.id = b.bigContractId AND a.id = #{arg0} INNER JOIN scm_xs_dealerclause c ON a.DealerClauseId = c.id) b ON a.agreementSummaryId = b.AgreementSummaryId AND a.commerceCode = b.productCode LEFT JOIN scm_zsj_product c ON a.commerceCode = c.productCode
mapper.update: UPDATE SCM_XS_AgreementProductDetail SET agreementSummaryId=#{agreementSummaryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commerceGauge=#{commerceGauge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isSign=#{isSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, effectiveDate=#{effectiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gaugeType=#{gaugeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isBidding=#{isBidding,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isImplement=#{isImplement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, biddingPrice=#{biddingPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, supplyPrice=#{supplyPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, allotGross=#{allotGross,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, acceptGross=#{acceptGross,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, purePinGross=#{purePinGross,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, wireTransferPrice=#{wireTransferPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, acceptPrice=#{acceptPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, purePinPrice=#{purePinPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, memo=#{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commerceCode=#{commerceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delivery=#{delivery,jdbcType=NUMERIC} WHERE id=#{id}
